title: Clojure
excerpt: Closing the old web with the new web
list1: With more time spent I've achieved less than five years ago.
Around 80% of my work was spent on the stack versus solving the problem.
It made me frustrated and anxious like never before.

Gatsby, Next.js are my worst framework experiences compared to Wordpress, Shopify, Yii, Laravel, Jekyll, Sinatra, Ruby on Rails, Gulp. If that's the JavaScript way — millions of investment in the news, frustrated devs on Github — I won't take part of it.
I didn't learn anything interesting during this period. In spite the problem domain is novel and challenging.

footnotes.title: Styled components issue: Creating custom animations using styled objects
